Articles.Content:
anyone need a model (textured,animated)?

im kinda bored so im willing to create some models for people free of charge of course .

if you like me te create a model for you please leave a comment and/or example image.

Could you also do Unity rigging? I could use an IVA for the CSS Space Shuttle. Link to thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/8428-Component-Space-Shuttle-V-5-0-1-%28July-14-2013%29

As for pictures, Google has countless Shuttle interior shots: https://www.google.pl/search?q=space+shuttle+interior&espv=210&es_sm=122&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&sa=X&ei=5LZrUqWsLcSOtQbM4oAI&ved=0CCwQsAQ&biw=1680&bih=892

Could you also do Unity rigging? I could use an IVA for the CSS Space Shuttle. Link to thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/8428-Component-Space-Shuttle-V-5-0-1-%28July-14-2013%29

As for pictures, Google has countless Shuttle interior shots: https://www.google.pl/search?q=space+shuttle+interior&espv=210&es_sm=122&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&sa=X&ei=5LZrUqWsLcSOtQbM4oAI&ved=0CCwQsAQ&biw=1680&bih=892

i will download the module and look into creating an iva model for it.

although i must admit i nevver created a working iva (working in the sence of interactable props) but im sure someone could do that later.

Well, if you wanna do some freelance work for Cabana Corp. then just shoot me a PM. All models will be yours by copyright and you get credits for them too (I know, right?!). You do take peanuts covered in Mystery Goo, right?
